attr.attrdef: Enter 1 if at least one file, that could not be assigned otherwise to species, could be assigned as belonging to the 40kHz Myotis group.
Enter 1 if Antrozous pallidus was recorded and identified on a given night and 0 on nights when it was not recorded.
Enter 1 if Corynorhinus rafinesquii was recorded and identified on a given night and 0 on nights when it was not recorded.
Enter 1 if Corynorhinus townsendii was recorded and identified on a given night and 0 on nights when it was not recorded.

descript.abstract: Dataset represents presence of bat species as determined from acousticmonitoring. Detectors were deployed at sites within National Forests accordingA Plan for the North American Bat Monitoring Program (NABat) guidelines.Acoustic data were screened and analyzed by Christen Long, Bat Conservation International. Data were analyzed to determine species present per night. Map symbols represent detector locations. For more information at each site, click the info tab, and then draw a box around your area of interest.
